question:
Which section of IPC states that if any person of unsound mind or mentally ill person commits any offence due to his unsoundness of mind not
capable of knowing the nature of the act having no knowledge of wrong or right or Law is no offence?
explanation:
The section 84 of IPC states that if any person of unsound mind or mentally ill person commits any offence due to his unsoundness of mind not
capable of knowing the nature of the act having no knowledge of wrong or right or Law is no offence.
